import React from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { formatNumber } from '../../Common/index'; const Cart = () => { const state = useSelector((state) => state.cart.cartItems); console.log(state.length) const renderCart = state.map((cartItem) => { const { id, tenSP, giaSP, urlAnhSanPham, giaKhuyenMai, khuyenMaiNavigation, cartQuantity, kichThuoc, chatLieuNavigation } = cartItem; return (
  • {tenSP}
    { khuyenMaiNavigation.sale > 0 ? {formatNumber(giaKhuyenMai)} VNĐ : {formatNumber(giaSP)} VNĐ }
    Kích thước : {kichThuoc}
    Chất liệu : {chatLieuNavigation.tenChatLieu}
    Số lượng:
    Tổng
    { khuyenMaiNavigation.sale > 0 ? formatNumber(giaKhuyenMai * cartQuantity) : formatNumber(giaSP * cartQuantity) } VNĐ
    • ) }) const emtyCart = () => { return ( <>
    ! Giỏ hàng rỗng, bạn chưa thêm sản phẩm nào
    Mua hàng tiếp
    ); } const Checkout = () => { return ( <> Đặt ngay ) } return (
    {/* main */}

    Giỏ hàng của bạn

      { state.length === 0 ? emtyCart() : renderCart }
    { state.length === 0 ? "" : Checkout() }
    There are 3 item in your cart
    Total products: £200.00
    Total Shipping: Free
    Total: £200.00 (tax incl.)
      {/*
    • Security policy (edit with Customer reassurance module)
    • Delivery policy (edit with Customer reassurance module)
    • Return policy (edit with Customer reassurance module)
      • */}
    ); }; export default Cart;
